column2: my fiance (aka person I go out to eat with most) does not share my unabiding passion for all things tapas. So
column3: its a rare occasion when I get to come here. Maybe thats part of the reason that I like it so much
column4: maybe...but I've never been disappointed by something I've ordered. The basics are great - tortilla espanola
column8: the specials that I've tried have been good too
column9: including a seared tuna and watermelon soup that were both yum.
